name: Zof
description:
All the puzzles in Zof have a simple solution. But as you move through the game, that solution is more and more deeply hidden.

You'll never wonder how to do something, you'll only wonder what you need to do.

Enjoy exploring unusual environments and learn to work strange mechanisms.

Relax in the knowledge that Zof is non-linear. If you get stuck, you can always go back to the main area and try something different.

Zof is a very peaceful game.
